short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View youtube thumbnails with a single click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview youtube thumbnails in a small chrome extension popup window. Just click on the extension while on a youtube video page, and it will load up the thumbnail image. Click on the image and you will be redirected to the largest size of the thumbnail.
